void NodefullModelAnimation::play ( float  time,
float  blendRatio,
int  flags 
) [virtual]

This method applies the animation with the given parameters to the global node table.

If flags are positive, then the first bit indicates whether or not movement should be taken out of the animation, and the second bit indicates whether or not it should be played as a coordinated animation.

Implements ModelAnimation.

bool NodefullModelAnimation::valid (  )  const [virtual]

This function returns true if the NodefullModelAnimation is in a valid state.

This function will not raise a critical error or assert if called but may commit ERROR_MSGs to the log.

Returns:
Returns true if the animation is in a valid state, otherwise false.

Reimplemented from ModelAnimation.
